content:
Craft an item of type: white_bed
inventory=[{"type": "stripped_jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "popped_chorus_fruit", "quantity": 19, "index": 15}, {"type": "red_stained_glass", "quantity": 54, "index": 18}, {"type": "orange_concrete_powder", "quantity": 26, "index": 21}, {"type": "conduit", "quantity": 31, "index": 22}, {"type": "red_tulip", "quantity": 11, "index": 23}, {"type": "light_gray_stained_glass", "quantity": 56, "index": 25}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 3, "index": 27}, {"type": "smithing_table", "quantity": 58, "index": 32}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 44, "index": 37}, {"type": "stripped_birch_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}, {"type": "stripped_warped_hyphae", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]

thought: To craft a white bed, I need to craft warped planks. The warped planks recipe requires either a warped stem, stripped warped stem, warped hyphae, or stripped warped hyphae. I have a stripped warped hyphae at slot 44, but before I can craft the warped planks, I need to craft the stripped jungle log at slot 10 into a crafting table. Therefore I will move the stripped jungle log from slot 10 to slot 1 so that I can craft it into a crafting table.
Ok
act: move from slot 10 to slot 1 with quantity 1

thought: Now that I've crafted the jungle planks, I can move them to a storage slot (eg., 11) to make space for the next crafting step.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4
